text: So to celebrate the wonderful David Loftus Food
Photography Course on FoodTube, people are loving it,
we're going to do a competition. Me and David are going to do a competition where you can win a prize to
come to Jamie Magazine, do a whole days photo shoot with David.
We want you cooking and taking pictures of beautiful food. Me and David will go

through all of the pictures. It can be anything
to do with food. It could be plated. It could be produce. Take a
picture on a posh camera, a mobile phone, I don't care what. Upload it to FoodTube
and we're going to look through it, but let's open it out to Instagram as well for all you
Take the picture of your food,
put it up on Instagram and hashtag it FOODTUBECOMP and I'll look through every single one of those pictures
and one of you will be here doing your thing.
Take care and I'll see you soon.

So click on any of the links below
to see David Loftus

at work and he's going to show you how
you can be a great food photographer.
